recipesJson.name: Strawberry Shortcake | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, and Folkart.  Ever since Max discovered WF Strawberry Gummy Candy, he can't get enough.  This recipe was specifically designed for strawberry mutes.  If you cannot taste most strawberries, this might be the one for you.  We did not release an episode with this final recipes, however, you can watch our process on our 1st and 2nd versions on DEVELOPED Episode 45 at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P5TIb8m-e0Y .

Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST.
Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com - We now have Merch!
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

reviews.text: This is a good strawberry vape.  I vaped up 60ml fast!  However, I taste strawberry jam on cake.  I need to taste freshly cut, sugared strawberries and whipped cream  in a Strawberry Shortcake.  As a Strawberry jam on cake it'd be 5 stars.  But, for me, this isn't a Strawberry Shortcake.

This isn't exactly what I expected to taste, but I'd say that's a good thing. I personally rarely get enough, if any distinction in layers with other strawberry shortcakes I've tried. This right here is an awesome strawberry shortcake. I get alot of cake up front (which was my favorite part, and is always missing from others) and then i get a really fresh but jammy strawberry that is really unfamiliar tasting to me (being that these are newer strawberries) that isnt completely in your face but is present enough. Doesn't take away from any other part of the profile. And then it leaves a very heavy cream taste on the tail end. This is delicious, thank you for another banger!
